description.lang: Inovelli's Door/Window + Temperature Sensor brings the best of both worlds. Monitor your door or window as well as the temperature! This smart sensor is one of the smallest Z-Wave Plus sensors on the market and comes with a battery (CR14250) as well as adhesive to mount. In addition, step by step video and written instructions can be found on our website for easy installation.Simplifying lives, one smart home product at a time... that's Inovelli. *Please see our Amazon or our website for compatible HUB's (not all HUB's support temperature reading).
